sub_title: Senior Business Consultant at Tata Consultancy Services
summary:
Senior Business Analyst with 12 years experience, working in the Information Technology and Services industry. Skilled in Business Requirements Gathering, Planning, Stakeholders Management, Project management, Business Architecture, Business Process Improvement, Manufacturing Execution System and Supply Chain Management. 

Ability to understand complex Business and IT landscape and convert it into bite-sized information.

Effective communication skills with the ability to communicate complex ideas.

Strong analytical skills with an Engineer’s Degree specialized in Information Technology.

school.name: West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata

awards.title: Contextual Master
awards.description: Has been awarded with TCS Gems and appreciation for having contextual knowledge on domain, technology and in-depth process knowledge on Customers IT and Business landscape thereby helping growth of both client and my organisation.

awards.title: Star of the Quarter
awards.description: Consistent High performer throughout the quarter

certifications.name: Business Analyst Certification
certifications.authority: Tata Consultancy Services (IIBA Endorsed Education Provider)

certifications.name: Functional Knowledge and Skills - Business Analysis
Steel Rolling - Strip Products and Stainless Steel
IBM Certified Solution Architect - Cloud Computing Infrastructure V1

profile_positions.description:
•Responsible for identifying ways in which IT can add value to the business by the identification and delivery of innovative, effective and efficient solutions to valid business requirements and opportunities.
•Responsible for designing new business processes and create/contribute in IT roadmaps 
•Engaged with and influenced key managers and stakeholders, supporting the partnership between IT and the business, progressing initiatives to meet the future needs of the business and ensuring that the benefits of IT solutions are realized.
•Analyzing business issues and business processes in relation to IT to identify strengths and weakness of IT related processes and opportunities for improvement
•Presenting the preliminary investigation results to senior managers, engaging and challenging them in the process of developing solutions for their business issues and problems 
•Analyzing business requirement/issues using various technique like MoSCoW and also evaluating and presented the business case based on SWOT and Cost-Benefit analysis.
•Stakeholder Management
•Working as Business architect to provide guidance on complex business requirement and supporting the enterprise architect model
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•Led, supervised and informed stakeholders on the status of project implementations to ensure that they are on track and the milestones are achieved. 
•Responsible for change management process lifecycle
•Ensured timely and accurate completion of each change with an assessment of the relevant project elements, in order to make sure that the end results effectively comply with the specifications.
•Monitored forward demand and participated in planning for delivery and prioritization at a tactical level. 
•Maintained understanding of business processes and models as well as industry best practices.
•Developed models in consultation with the business/customers to ensure that main business processes and their mutual relationships with other business processes are optimally facilitated by the IT solutions.
•Interacted with key stakeholders to make recommendations and persuade them to approve and initiate changes that will deliver business value.
•Organized and delivered workshops to enhance the knowledge of key-users in a multi-disciplinary, international environment with the experience and insights of specialists.
•Initiated and supported projects and enhancements to improve IT solutions to optimize and make the business processes more effective and efficient
•Presented and explained opinions and options to the customer management, to reinforce recommendations and promote the proposed business case and solution.	
•Supported regular and ongoing communication and interaction with key business representatives at tactical and strategical levels.
•Monitored new business/IT capabilities to take into account for future developments.
•Advised on feasibility and sustainability of business IT solutions
•Supported UAT process and associated business validation to ensure effective acceptance and realization of benefits.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•Experience of working on Change Proposal activities (Responding to RFC, preparing solution offering, Functional and Technical Designing, ensuring seamless stakeholder management of internal & external teams, solution implementation and support)
•Analysis of business issues and process mentioned in RFC in relation to various IT solutions required by customer 
•Ensured that the IT solutions satisfies the business requirements and is compatible with current processes
•Handled client interaction for requirement gathering, finalizing functional and technical specifications
•Suggested appropriate solutions for enhancing functional efficiency of the organization and achieving business excellence
•Assisted solution architect & technical team in preparation of business case , response document enabling various stakeholders to take informed decision
•Performed unit, system & integration test and assisted end users during UAT
•Developed and validate deployment plan with key business users to implement new solutions effectively without impacting the day-to-day activities
•Contributing Organisation growth through Innovation by suggesting implementable ideas to customers
•Project Manager for small to mid size Projects
•Led cross-functional teams to understand and analyze operational opportunities and impacts on number of custom based applications pertaining to customer IT landscape
•Monitoring progress report of different changes raised in the system and creation and maintenance of capacity plan
•Techno-Functional consultant for Supply Chain Transformation Program for large Steel manufacturing client and was responsible for the delivery of Functional and Technical specification.
profile_positions.title: Developer, Analyst, Technical Lead, Assistant Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Involved in automation testing using Certify Automation tool from Worksoft
•	Preparation of Test cases and Test Scripts and execution of test scripts for end-to-end Testing
•	Preparation of test documents which includes Unit test, System test and Integration test
profile_positions.title: Associate Consultant
